testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to buy a object without login page
testcase.name: User can buy a object without login
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate base page...............................................passed When user click "Giyim & aksesuar", "Kadın İç Giyim" and "Dizaltı Çorap" tab.passed And user click 1 object display "siyah" one.................................passed And user click Sepete Ekle button, "Sepeti Görüntüle" button , "Sepeti Onayla" button , "ÜYE OLMADAN DEVAM ET" button.passed And user displayed mail section on the page and enter a mail address........passed And user click Yeni adres oluştur button and displayed "Adres Güncelleme" pop-up on the page.passed And user enter "Home" as Adres Başlığı, "Ad" , "Soyad" , "Cep Telefonu", "Adres" and select city, township and district and click KAYDET button.passed And user select 1 cargo firm and click Kaydet Ve Devam Et button............passed Then user select 2 payment tab and complete order and display payment web page.passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I should be able to buy a object without login page on mobile app
testcase.name: User can buy a object without login on mobile app
testcase.system-out: Given user open mobile app..................................................passed When user click "GİYİM & AKSESUAR", "Kadın İç Giyim" and "Dizaltı Çorap" tab on mobile app.passed And user click object display "Siyah" one on mobile app.....................passed And user click "SEPETE EKLE" button, "SEPETE GİT" button , "SEPETİ ONAYLA" button , "ÜYE OLMADAN DEVAM ET" button on mobile app.passed And user displayed mail section on the page and enter a mail address on mobile app.passed And user click "Yeni adres oluştur" button on mobile app....................passed And user enter "Home" as Adres Başlığı, "Ad" , "Soyad" , "Cep Telefonu", "Adres" and select "ADANA" city, "FEKE" township and "KONAKKURAN MAH" district and click KAYDET button on mobile app.passed And user select 1 cargo firm and click Kaydet Ve Devam Et button on mobile app.passed Then user select 2 payment tab, click "Garanti Pay ile Öde" and complete order and display payment web page on mobile app.passed
